name: [platform]er
description:
[PLATFORM]er

A small FPS game made in a week for a jam.  Jump, control different types of platform and use grappling hook to navigate the level and collect all the points. 

Controls:
Use WASD and SPACE to move.
Use LMB to attack.
[!] Aim your reticle at colored block and press RMB to activate it.

You can view the source files on the project github page, feel free to use the code as you like.
